images.copyright: Water lilies at the surface of Cenote Nicte-Ha, Tulum, Mexico (© Franco Banfi/NPL/Minden Pictures)
images.title: Wat-er wonderful world!
images.caption: World Water Day
images.desc: March 22 is World Water Day, a United Nations initiative highlighting the importance of fresh water and its conservation. This day raises awareness about the global water crisis and promotes actions to ensure clean water for all. Fresh water is vital—not just for drinking, but for ecosystems, agriculture, and cultural heritage.
